title: Kennedy Center official confirms he has resigned less than two weeks after hiring
summary_full: Kevin Couch says he ‘resigned yesterday’, amid recent turmoil following a leadership overhaul initiated by TrumpThe newly appointed senior vice-president of artistic programming at Washington DC’s John F Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, Kevin Couch, has resigned less than two weeks after his hiring was announced.Couch confirmed he “resigned yesterday” in a statement to the Guardian on Thursday. Continue reading...
